name: TapRush
tag_list: mobile, advertising, distribution, cpi, app, app-install, app-installs, mobile-apps, application-downloads, cpa, mobile-distribution, app-download, mobile-sales, mobile-performance-marketing
overview:
TapRush thrives at the center of the of mobile advertising nervous system. The company’s industry leading tracking technology enables advertisers to tap into endless mobile distribution without the complexities of implementing numerous tracking solutions. All that’s required is one SDK and we handle the rest. Working exclusively on a Cost Per Install basis, TapRush, takes all the risk out of your mobile application distribution. This is the most effective solution for mobile customer acquisition.

The TapRush solution gives advertisers access to every major mobile distribution channel including media buys on AdMob, MobClix, JumpTap, Nexage, Radium One; as well as incentive channels like TapJoy and Flurry. The company builds custom media plans to fit the goals of every advertiser, guaranteeing results

TapRush is backed by Angel Rush ventures. Headquartered in San Francisco, the company also has offices in New York, London and Tokyo. For more information, please visit www.taprush.com.
